title: MacBook Pro 820 2936 just stopped working only green light on power cable no fan spin
message:
No liquid damage, just stopped working, only action is green light
looking for voltages
12.5v is there, but fluctuates between 12.51v - 12.55v
3.42v is there
PP3V3_S5 unstable

PPVRTC unstable

PM_SLP_S4_L - 0v

PP3V3_S5 unstable

PP5V_S5 unstable

PP3V3_S4 unstable

From what it looks like on the schematic, u7200 create 5v and 3.3v
changed u7200, no change
I can't see anything that might be causing the voltages to be unstable, what else could be causing it?
The fluctuations in the 12.5v line?
Thanks

title: MacBook Pro 820 2936 just stopped working only green light on power cable no fan spin
message: Same as what I said on FaceBook if VCore pulses could me one of many things. If VCore does not pulse, then check all rails for shorts especially PP5v_S3

title: MacBook Pro 820 2936 just stopped working only green light on power cable no fan spin
message: S O B. Short on C6213, burnt my hand on it cranking some voltage into the line. Job done, thanks.

title: MacBook Pro 820 2936 just stopped working only green light on power cable no fan spin
message: Nicely done! Common for these to have that issue good to remember for next time :)
